dl.dd: Type: one of the values below
This attribute indicates which element to the right or below the template.XULElem("splitter") should be resized when the splitter is repositioned.

ul.li: closest: The element immediately to the right or below the splitter resizes.
farthest: The element that is the farthest away from the splitter to the right or below the splitter resizes.
grow: The elements to the right or below the splitter do not change size (unless they are flexible) when the splitter is dragged, but instead the entire container changes size.
flex: The closest flexible element resizes. template.Fx_minversion_inline(3)
